pacman.controller

类 Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.controller.Writer

  • public class Writer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class write scores stored in ScoreRecord into highscore.txt file. The results are whipped after the program is ended, but are remained during several plays.
    作者:
    Zhangli Wang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Writer() 

    • 方法概要

      Write scores into highscore.txt file.

    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • writeScores

        public void writeScores()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Write scores into highscore.txt file.

        Iteratively write each score of the scores in ScoreRecord. For each Score or Lifes to be written, convert Text type to String type.

        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - unable to write streams
